article_title: 1 In 4 New Doctors Would Change Careers If They Could Start Over

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Even as doctors enter a medical field with more paying patients under the Affordable Care Act and unprecedented numbers of job opportunities, 25 percent of “newly trained physicians” would still choose another field if they could, according to a new analysis. More than 60 percent of doctors-in-training who were in the [...]
